name: Super Six Puzzle
description:
Choose the block to fill in the honeycomb, train your brain and have fun for days!!! A new addicting game that will make you use your logic and kill your boredom immediately.

Built this honeycomb puzzle faster to show your challenge and compete with your friends, colleagues and the family.

It is very simple to play, you just drag the blocks and arrange how to fill it on the honeycomb.When the honeycomb is filled, it will be eliminated and the game will end when there is no longer a blank.

No time limit!

Match the blocks to make the honeycomb!

Use hints to help yourself solve the puzzle!

Enjoy the play!!!
